Name: Dr. Dustin Moody
Title: Mathematician & PQC Lead
Bio: Leads the global effort to evaluate and standardize post-quantum cryptographic algorithms (FIPS 203/204/205).

Name: Ollie Whitehouse
Title: Chief Technical Officer
Bio: Driving the UK's strategic roadmap for PQC migration and industry preparedness.
KeyContributionTitle: Sausages and incentives: rewarding a resilient technology future

Name: Jérôme Plût
Title: Head of Cryptography Laboratory
Bio: Key figure in defining France's hybrid transition strategy and national security requirements.
KeyContributionTitle: Avis scientifique et technique sur la migration PQC

Name: Mark Hughes
Title: Global Managing Partner
Bio: Advocate for Cryptographic Bill of Materials (CBOM) and leader in IBM's quantum-safe initiatives.
KeyContributionTitle: Training Like It’s Real: The Only Option Against Today’s Cyberattacks

Name: Jack Hidary
Title: CEO
Bio: Pioneering the intersection of AI and Quantum security to help enterprises manage the PQC transition.

Name: Andersen Cheng
Title: CEO
Bio: Coined the term 'Harvest Now, Decrypt Later' and advocates for immediate action on data privacy.
KeyContributionTitle: The Needle is Shifting on Post-Quantum Security

Name: Dr. Ali El Kaafarani
Title: CEO & Research Fellow
Bio: Leading the development of hardware and software PQC solutions and contributing to NIST standards.
KeyContributionTitle: The new NIST standards are here: what does it mean for PQC in 2024?

Name: Vadim Lyubashevsky
Title: Principal Research Scientist
Bio: Expert in lattice-based cryptography and co-developer of CRYSTALS-Kyber and CRYSTALS-Dilithium.

Name: Peter Schwabe
Title: Scientific Director & Professor
Organizations: MPI-SP; Radboud University; Ruhr University Bochum
Bio: Leader in cryptographic engineering and PQC standardization (SPHINCS+, Kyber, Dilithium).

Name: Lily Chen
Title: Mathematician & Group Leader
Bio: Leads NIST's cryptographic technology group and PQC standardization efforts.

Name: Michele Mosca
Title: CEO & Professor
Bio: Pioneer in quantum risk management and co-founder of the Institute for Quantum Computing.
